feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 6:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: E 15 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
